title: installation help
body:
Hello could you help me with the setup  process with  the anotator, I get the following errors when i run the set of commands on DOCKER.

S C:\Users\dell1> docker pull doccano/doccano
Using default tag: latest
latest: Pulling from doccano/doccano
852e50cd189d: Pull complete                                                                                             334ed303e4ad: Pull complete                                                                                             a687a65725ea: Pull complete                                                                                             fe607cb30fbe: Pull complete                                                                                             b8a3bc0a3645: Pull complete                                                                                             a31a725c8d72: Pull complete                                                                                             3d2e38361e9e: Pull complete                                                                                             b8727b7115d7: Pull complete                                                                                             e6f06fecba9b: Pull complete                                                                                             eaa45aa2e5ef: Pull complete                                                                                             9b337517539a: Pull complete                                                                                             768ff89d7d9f: Pull complete                                                                                             Digest: sha256:9fdd2facb4f9fecb97a80ca90691f47daf95297fceb7d56be56e8d21e3146c7b
Status: Downloaded newer image for doccano/doccano:latest
docker.io/doccano/doccano:latest
PS C:\Users\dell1> docker container create --name doccano \
invalid reference format
PS C:\Users\dell1> docker container create --name doccano \ -e "ADMIN_USERNAME=admin" \
invalid reference format
PS C:\Users\dell1>   -e "ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@example.com" \
PS C:\Users\dell1>   -e "ADMIN_PASSWORD=password" \
-e : The term '-e' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the
spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
At line:1 char:3
+   -e "ADMIN_PASSWORD=password" \
+   ~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (-e:String) [], CommandNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException

PS C:\Users\dell1> docker  container create --name doccano \ -e "ADMIN_USERNAME=admin"\ -e "ADMIN_EMAIL=xyz@XYZ.com" \ -e "ADMIN_PASSWORD=password"\ -p 8000:8000 doccano/doccano
invalid reference format


Usage:  docker container create [OPTIONS] IMAGE [COMMAND] [ARG...]
